name: No Auto Retry+
description: Bugfixes and enhancements for disabling the 'Auto Retry' option

practice-death-screen.name: Practice mode death screen
practice-death-screen.description: Show the death screen in practice mode, just like normal mode

force-practice-cursor.name: Visible cursor on death in practice mode
force-practice-cursor.description: Makes the cursor visible when you die in practice mode, only does anything if practice death screen is enabled

click-anywhere-retry.name: Click anywhere to retry
click-anywhere-retry.description: Retries the current level by clicking/tapping anywhere on the death screen rather than just the retry button

instant-retry.name: Instant retry
instant-retry.description: Retry the current level on mouse down rather than mouse up, useful for levels that require you to jump on the first frame. (ex. low death.)

up-arrow-retry.name: Up arrow retry
up-arrow-retry.description: Up arrow retries the level just like the spacebar does (also enables the up arrow to play levels)
